resources.string: Welcome to Blindspot app. Select Register or Login below. You can disable the voice introduction from the menu in each screen.
Please register to the app by entering Name, Email and Password." You can select to stay connected below.
Please login to the app by entering Email and Password. You can select to stay connected below.
You can use the Scanner or manage your wardrobe. Select one of them below.
You can use this screen to scan any cloth by attaching NFC tag to back of your phone. You can share the cloth with others after the scan by pressing the button below.

You can handle your wardrobe from this screen. Attach the NFC tag of the cloth to add it to the wardrobe or to remove it from the wardrobe. You can filter the clothes by selecting a type from the dropdown list below.
NFC or Android Beam is not active. Select OPEN in the dialog to open NFC settings.
